name: Super Sudden Death Land
description:
Master a strange battle system where everything has 1 HP. Turn-based combat with a twist.

Fight fire with fire. Navigate through enemies' shields with matching magic. 

Cast spells. Blow up bombs. Defend with crystal shields. Whack 'em dead.

Battle alongside fighting-game characters in a sudden death round. Everyone knocked each other out at the same time. Trapped in a boundary world between victory and defeat, band together to turn the battle upside down.

Explore an island, collect treasure, level up. A new take on the classic RPG genre.

Featuring an original soundtrack and all-new audio.
